description: Returns all records whose specified attribute (such as FIRST NAME or ZIPCODE) matches the given criteria (like John or 90210).
Outputs a description of the specified command. Entering 'help' without a command will output a list of all commands available within the Event Reporter program.
Loads the specified file for search operations.
Gives the number of records in the current queue.
Empties the queue for the next search.
Exports the current queue as a valid HTML file.
Prints a tab-delimited data table of all records in the current queue.
Prints a tab-delimited data table of all records in the current queue
column4: sorted by the specified attribute (like LAST NAME or ZIPCODE).

description: Exports the current queue to a CSV file with the specified name.
